/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the urban landscape of the city. Trees line the street, their green foliage contrasting with the concrete structures. Cars and pedestrians animate the scene, adding a sense of movement and life to the image. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day.
